article_title: Thai Police Arrest Two Myanmar Migrant Workers for British Tourist Killings
article_text:
BANGKOK—Thai police Friday arrested two migrant workers from Myanmar for killing two British tourists at the beach resort of Koh Tao last month, and said that DNA samples from the two men match those taken from the female victim.

The brutal killing of Hannah Witheridge, 23, and David Miller, 25, has transfixed the nation and shaken the tourism business in Koh Tao, an eight-square mile island in the Gulf of Thailand that until recently was widely viewed as haven from the kind of excesses that have permeated other beach...
